attributes.action: Lift the ban on Michael Savage entering Britain
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
This illegitimate government has almost completely stifled free speech in the name of anti-terror - it has turned our once great country into a police state. Free speech is the cornerstone of any free society.

Michael Savage's only crime is to have opinions that are critical of government tyranny; opinions that are shared by more and more ordinary Britons.

We demand that the Home Secretary lifts the ban on Michael Savage entering Britain.
